alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 24 at 3:38AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor coastal flooding is expected late tonight into early Wednesday morning, especially around times of high tide. This includes flood prone areas along the I-10 Bayway and U.S. Highway 90 Causeway, in addition to other low lying areas along the shoreline prone to coastal flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
